mapper.insert: insert into products(product_no, category_no, product_name, product_price, product_content, product_date, product_qty, product_cnt, product_state, seller_no) values(#{productNo}, #{categoryNo}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productContent}, sysdate, #{productQty}, 0, 0, #{sellerNo})
insert into product_img(image_no, product_no, image_name, image_size, thumbnail, image_date) values(#{imageNo}, #{productNo}, #{imageName}, #{imageSize}, '1', sysdate)
mapper.update: update products set category_no=#{categoryNo}, product_name=#{productName}, product_price=#{productPrice}, product_content=#{productContent}, product_qty=#{productQty} where product_no=#{productNo}
update product_img set image_name=#{imageName}, image_size=#{imageSize} where product_no=#{productNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from products where seller_no=#{sellerNo}

select * from (select rownum n, p.product_no, category_no, product_name, product_price, product_content, product_date, product_qty, product_cnt, product_state, seller_no, image_name from products p left outer join product_img i on p.product_no = i.product_no where thumbnail = 1 and seller_no = ( select seller_No from user_seller s left outer join users u on s.user_no = u.user_no where id=#{id})) where n between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum n, product_no, category_no, product_name, product_price, product_content, product_date, product_qty, product_cnt, product_state, seller_no from products where seller_no = (select seller_No from user_seller s left outer join users u on s.user_no = u.user_no where id=#{id})) where product_state = 1 and n between #{start} and #{end}
select * from product_category order by category_no
select * from products p left outer join product_img i on p.product_no=i.product_no where p.product_no=#{productNo} and thumbnail=0
